name: GetCodeScanningAnalysis
description:
Retrieve detailed code scanning analysis for a GitHub repository.

Use this tool to access a specific code scanning analysis for a GitHub repository, including information such as the Git reference, commit SHA, analysis datetime, code scanning tool name, and the number of alerts. It requires appropriate permissions for both private and public repositories.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: Specify the account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the GitHub repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: analysis_id
parameters.description: The ID number of the code scanning analysis to retrieve for the repository. This ID is obtained from the `GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/code-scanning/analyses` operation.

value_schema.description: The ID of the analysis, as returned from the `GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/code-scanning/analyses` operation.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repo
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: analysis_id
parameters.description: The ID of the analysis, as returned from the `GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/code-scanning/analyses` operation.

value_schema.description: The ID of the analysis, as returned from the `GET /repos/{owner}/{repo}/code-scanning/analyses` operation.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
